  • Method Details

    • purchaseItem

      public void purchaseItem​(Item item, Player player)
      Purchase item. Creates a copy of an Item in the stock using Item.copyItem() and adds it to the player's Inventory.
      Parameters:
      item - the item
      player - the player

    • sellItem

      public void sellItem​(Item item, Player player)
      Sell item. Removes parameter item from the Player's Inventory and increases their Player.balanceProperty() using the Item.getValue().
      Parameters:
      item - the item
      player - the player
